options.text: It would be a gas at room temperature, have a high melting point, and be a poor conductor of heat.

options.label: B
options.text: It would be a solid metal at room temperature, have a low melting point, and be a good conductor of heat.

options.label: C
options.text: It would be a liquid at room temperature, have a high melting point, and be a poor conductor of heat.

options.label: D
options.text: It would be a solid metal at room temperature, have a high melting point, and be a poor conductor of heat.
